Text:
To crack:

1. Install FontLab.
2. Open Patcher.
3. Accept first message.
4. Click "Select FontLab Studio 5_App".
5. Choose installed application executable file. The one in /Applications, not the one in your downloads directory.
6. Wait until program says executable is patched.
7. Enjoy.

If you are prompted for a user name you can put any name.
Thanks grogxD for the great seed! Unfortunately the patcher won't launch. When you double-click on it, nothing happens. Mac OSX Mountain Lion 10.8.2.

Check that non-identified developer's apps are allowed:

1. Preference Panel.
2. Security & Privacy.
3. General.
4. Allow applications downloaded from "Anywhere".

Alternatively:

1. Secondary click on patch.
2. Open.
3. Confirm you want to open a non-identified developer's application.

I could not either use the patch file.
I made a new one ; I made a new torrent, but without a permanent internet connection, I can't make sure I can seed regularly.
http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8289079

I can explain how I did it. Quite simple.
go to http://ipatch.org to download iPatch.
Launch iPatch. Create a new Patch with any original and modified files from your computer.
Save new Patch.
Edit new Patch application content and replace Contents/Resources with the similar folder provided in this torrent.
